text: Farmer at work (also known as Contadino al lavoro) is a painted in oil by Francesco Filippini. It was painted in 1908-1910, in Milano, Italy. The work is an expression of the Filippinsim movement, which will then turn into futurism. == Other websites == * Francesco Filippini * Lombard countryside (Boccioni) Category:Paintings by Umberto Boccioni Category:1900s paintings
title: Farmer at work
